text: Esther and the King () is a 1960 American Italian romantic drama movie directed by Raoul Walsh and starring Joan Collins, Richard Egan, Denis O'Dea. Raoul Walsh and Michael Elkins wrote the screenplay, which was based on the Book of Esther of the Hebrew Bible and the Old Testament. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * * * * Category:1960 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Italian romance movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Movies based on the Bible Category:Movies about antisemitism Category:Movies set in Iran Category:Movies directed by Raoul Walsh Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Esther and the King
